        {% for fn in class.functions %} {% unless fn.access == 'private' %}

      • .{{namespace.name}} : object
          {% for fn in namespace.functions %}
        • {% assign name = fn.name | split: '.' %} .{{name.last}}({{ fn.parameters | map: 'name' | join: ',' }}) {% if fn.returns %} ⇒ {{fn.returns.type}} {% endif %}
          • {% endfor %}
      {% endfor %}
